formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of EC-Compuware-Topaz configuration to use.

formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:
formElement.documentation: If this is set to the path of a property sheet, then the number of tests run, the number of errors encountered during the tests, and the number of those errors that were simply tests that failed (as opposed to more serious problems that prevented execution of tests) will be returned as properties called tests, errors, and failures respectively in that property sheet. (These properties also exist on the step that runs this procedure.)

formElement.label: Project Path:
formElement.documentation: The path of the folder containing the Total Test project.

formElement.label: Test Suite or Test Suite List:
formElement.documentation: The name of the test scenario(s) or test suite(s) to run. (-ts or -testsuitelist)

formElement.label: JCL
formElement.documentation: The name of the JCL to run the Topaz for Total Test test scenario or test suite.

formElement.label: External Tools Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The path of a directory to check out the source code. (-externaltoolsws => -data)

formElement.label: Dataset High Level Qualifier HLQ:
formElement.documentation: High level qualifier to be used when allocating datasets (optional).

formElement.label: Use Stubs:
formElement.documentation: Indicates if stubs should be used when running the test scenario or test suite. The default is to use stubs.

formElement.label: Delete Temp:
formElement.documentation: Delete temporary files after test run. The default is to delete temporary files.

formElement.label: Code Coverage Repo:
formElement.documentation: The dataset where Topaz for Total Test will write code coverage information (optional). This dataset will later be fed into the Code Coverage reporting system. Members with like systems, names, and compile date and times will automatically be merged together.

formElement.label: Code Coverage System:
formElement.documentation: A system name for this test (optional, ignored unless a Code Coverage Repo value is supplied). Code Coverage keeps statistics by programs separate by system name. This name can be any user-specified name. If not specified defaults to the test scenario/suite name.

formElement.label: Code Coverage Test ID:
formElement.documentation: A test identification to be added to the Code Coverage test (optional, required if a Code Coverage Repo value is supplied). This information can be useful when reviewing test reports from Code Coverage.

formElement.label: Code Coverage DB2:
formElement.documentation: Indicates if Code Coverage is for a DB2 program (ignored unless a Code Coverage Repo value is supplied). Should only be checked if the main program is IKJEFT01.
